title: Akeel Hassan Abbas Al Baiiaty deported to Iraq after raping Megs McLean
text:
An Iraqi refugee who raped a mother-of-three just two months after he was released on parole has finally been deported.

Akeel Hassan Abbas Al Baiiaty raped 20-year-old Megs McLean in a hostel in Wellington, New Zealand, in 2004.

When he committed the heinous attack, Al Baiiaty was on parole for raping two other women in 1997.

The refugee was deported back to Iraq on Tuesday and has been banned from setting foot in Australia or New Zealand again.

Akeel Hassan Abbas Al Baiiaty raped 20-year-old Megs McLean in a hostel in Wellington, New Zealand in 2004 (file image)

'This perpetrator is a monster who will never set foot on Australian soil,' Senator Sarah Henderson said, The Geelong Advertiser reported.

The parole board found that the Al Baiiaty had was 'no longer a risk' and had completed all necessary rehabilitation.

Upon his return to Iraq, Al Baiiaty will be set up with a job as well as being reunited with his fiancee.

Ms McLean who suffers from post traumatic stress disorder after the horror attack said the authorities in New Zealand had failed her.

She claimed that after moving back to Australia she wasn't provided with any support.

'It feels like nothing will be done for me now. It's always felt like he's the one who they've supported, not me,' she said.

The mother said that while her attacker had been locked up for the last 15 years he had been educated.

Ms McLean also said that she was ignored by the authorities when asking about the security of Al Baiiaty's deportation, and possibility of him returning to Australia to visit his brother.

Ms Henderson said she the New Zealand's Accident Compensation Corporation needed to bring 'justice' to Ms McLean.

'I first raised her case in the parliament more than three years ago. I am shocked that New Zealand's Accident Compensation Corporation has still not determined her case. The endless delays and stonewalling are completely unacceptable,' she said.
description: Akeel Hassan Abbas Al Baiiaty raped 20-year-old Megs McLean in a hostel in Wellington, New Zealand in 2004.
authors: Eliza Mcphee For Daily Mail Australia
